AI Description: r-bitops is an R package that provides bitwise operations for integer vectors in R. It enables users to perform bitwise operations such as AND, OR, XOR, and bit shifting on integer vectors efficiently.
Core Features: Perform Bitwise Operations In R, Supports Operations Like &, Or, Xor, Bit Shifting, Efficient Handling Of Integer Vectors
General Tags: R Package, Bitwise Operations, Integer Vectors
